dalserver.conf

Class DbCreateConf

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.conf.DbCreateConf

  • public class DbCreateConf
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for seeding a configuration file for a table that is already loaded into the database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String db
      the name of the MySQL database to create table in
      protected java.lang.String dbmstype
      the DBMS vendor type being connected to.
      protected java.lang.String host
      the host:port where MySQL is running.
      protected java.lang.String pass
      the username to connect to the database with
      protected java.lang.String tbl
      the name to give the table within the database
      protected java.lang.String user
      the username to connect to the database with
